# StandardErc20.transferBatch() method

Transfer Tokens To Many Wallets

## Example

```javascript
// Data of the tokens you want to mint
const data = [
  {
    toAddress: "{{wallet_address}}", // Address to mint tokens to
    amount: 100, // How many tokens to mint to specified address
  },
  {
    toAddress: "0x...",
    amount: 100,
  },
];

await contract.transferBatch(data);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
transferBatch(args: TokenMintInput[]): Promise<Omit<{
        receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt;
        data: () => Promise<unknown>;
    }, "data">>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                          | Description |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| args      | [TokenMintInput](./sdk.tokenmintinput.md)\[\] |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Mint tokens from the connected wallet to many wallets
